answers.answer: You're due in 17 days and haven't had any glucose test done?At this point there is nothing you can do. If you have an undiagnosed gestational diabetes many things can go wrong with your baby, even stillborn.. Wish you all the best though
Why didn't yours done? If you don't mind me asking!Hopefully you don't have it but gestational diabetes could cause your baby to be born very sickly if you didn't eat properly!

I didn't get my sugar test done until I was almost 8 months pregnant and I found out that I did have it.. In all honestly, if you watch what and how much you eat then you should be fine. Just stay away from starchy foods until your baby is born.

question: What could happen if you don't get ur sugar test done? Plz answer. Due in 17 days
title: Sugar test Plz answer
